alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Jackson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 8:35AM CST until February 25 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Mississippi... Pascagoula At Merrill affecting George, Jackson and Greene Counties. For the Pascagoula River...including Merrill...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pascagoula At Merrill. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, Flood Stage. Water approaches homes in west Merrill. At 23.5 feet, water is under homes in Plum Bluff Estates. Streets of Merrill flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 AM CST Thursday the stage was 22.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:15 AM CST Thursday was 23.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.8 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. &&
